Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45803 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45803 affecting package python-urllib3 for versions less than 2.0.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-urllib3 is earlier than 2.0.7-1, affected by CVE-2023-45803
